alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 28 at 10:12PM PST until November 29 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte, Northern Humboldt Coast and Mendocino Coast Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast
